products.Name: Philips Compact Food Processor HR7530_01
products.Description:
Philips Compact Food Processor
Healthy home-made food, unlimited possibilities
Excellent results even with the toughest ingredients
850 W, 31 functions, 2-in-1 disc, French fries disc, storage box
PowerChop technology for optimal shredding performance
PowerChop technology is a combination of blade shape, cutting angle and inner container that enables optimal performance when chopping soft and hard food. It's also perfect for making purees and mixing cake batter! Fast preparation with a large filling opening for minimal pre-cut.

Quick and easy assembly of the parts

All accessories are dishwasher safe
All accessories can be easily cleaned in the upper basket of the dishwasher.

Resistant and transparent container for frequent use
A robust 1.5-liter container has a maximum capacity of 1 liter for up to 5 smoothie portions in one go.

Powerful 850 W motor for effortless processing
Our powerful motor can process a wide variety of ingredients, from bread dough to hard vegetables, coffee beans, cheese or chocolate. It also cuts and shreds very easily.

All-in-one: kneading, whisking, chopping, cutting, grinding and juicing
With more than 31 functions, there are no limits when it comes to preparation: meals, bread, sauces, ground coffee beans, juices and more. Use the high-quality, multifunctional accessories to chop, puree and chop ingredients with the S-blade, or cut and chop the ingredients with the 2-in-1 disc. What do you feel like doing today?

Color-coded speed and accessory instructions for easy assembly
To always get perfect results, all you have to do is match the accessory color to the same speed color. Speed level 1 is suitable for whipping cream and eggs as well as for preparing pastries and bread doughs. Speed level 2 is ideal for chopping onions, minced meat, preparing smoothies and more.

Smaller footprint and bowl for storing all accessories
The Viva food processor is extremely compact and saves space in the kitchen, but it has all the important kitchen utensils that you can easily stow in the storage box.

Double-sided 2-in-1 stainless steel discs: chop and cut
Thanks to the ergonomic, double-sided disc, it is easy to cut with one side and shred with the other!

Prepare up to 5 servings at the same time in the bowl with a capacity of 1.5 l
With the generous 2.1 l bowl (1.5 l max. Capacity) you can prepare up to 5 servings of cold soup at once.

products.Name: Redberry RC 113 Food chopper
products.Description:
YOUR TIME SAVER- No more manual grinding or chopping! The food chopper can grind meat, fruits, vegetables, salads, milkshakes, potatoes, baby food in seconds with just one button press. Everything is so easy!
PEACE OF MIND- Unique overheating protection function so that it will automatically stop working at high temperatures and be fully cooled. The new upgraded low-noise technology creates a quiet environment and enjoys the pleasure of making food
1.8L BPA-FREE GLASS BOWL- 8-cup large capacity meets both daily needs and family gatherings. The glass bowl is thickened for durability and easy to clean. Moreover, it is designed with a non-slip rubber ring at the bottom for stability, seal ring to prevent food splashing, and dual handles for easy transfer
VERY STRONG AND DURABLE- The 300-watt high power motor drives the double-layer detachable stainless steel blades, which can quickly and evenly cut the food. Upgraded and reinforced blades have better durability and sturdiness, and can effectively handle those heavy kitchen tasks for you.
Specifications
KEY FEATURES
Natural Living. Share with your family and friends to get more cooking inspiration
WHAT’S IN THE BOX

which glass bowl

products.Name: Philips Daily Collection Coffee maker HD7432/20
products.Description:
Philips Daily Collection Coffee maker,Simply delicious coffee
With aroma twister for the best taste experience
With glass jug
Compact design (0.6 L)
Black
Auto shut-off after 30 min. for energy-saving and safety reasons
30 minutes after brewing your coffee, the coffee maker switches off automatically to save energy and for safety. This is in accordance with EU regulations, which apply to all coffee makers in the EU. If you want your coffee to stay hot longer, Philips offers coffee makers with a thermal jug.

Aroma twister circulates the coffee for optimal taste
This smart nozzle inside the jug circulates the inflowing coffee evenly through the jug for an optimal and consistent aroma, from the first to the last cup.

Drip stop to pour a cup of coffee whenever you like
The drip stop allows you to pour a cup of coffee before the full brewing cycle is finished.

LED power switch lights up when the coffee maker is switched
The red light on the switch button illuminates when the coffee maker is switched on. Dishwasher proof parts for easy cleaning
The jug and filter holder can be easily cleaned in the dishwasher.

Compact design perfect for 2-7 cups
This coffee maker is specially designed for brewing 2 to 7 cups of coffee (maximum 0.6 litres). Thanks to its very compact design, this coffee maker takes up little space in your kitchen.

Water level indication for easy filling
Fill the water tank easily and precisely with the water level indication.

products.Name: Sokany Air Fryer
products.Description:
With this air fryer you caneat healthier without giving upthe taste and texture of your favorite foods. This particular air fryer features unique rapid air technology that circulates hot air with speed and precision for faster cooking and perfect results with less oil.
An adjustable temperature control up to 390 degrees lets you fry, bake, roast and grill a variety of foods. The safe lock system will never release the basket that ensures accuracy and consistent results.The removable drawer is easy to clean and never leave any residue.All parts of air fryer are dishwasher safe for a breeze cleanup. The easy features makes it easy to use and manually adjustable temperature control sytem allows you to set the best cooking time to prepare your food. This healthier fryer gives healthy food with up to 75% less fat and unique and original design of fryer working fast gives you the best
Order this item from sky garden and it will be delivered at your doorstep.

products.Name: Salter EK4548 Dual Cook Pro Air Fryer
products.Description:
Salter EK4548 Dual Cook Pro Air Fryer, Double Drawer Non-Stick Cooking, Sync & Match Cook Function, 2 XL Frying Trays For Independent Cooking, 8.2L, Sensor Touch Display With 12 Presets, 1450-1750W
With a duo basket design, this 8.2L fryer has two 4.1L independent frying trays, ideal for cooking different foods or double portions.
The adjustable temperature and 60 minute timer gives you control over each compartment allowing you to cook different foods together.
The sync and match cook functions allow both compartments to be ready at the same time with a temperature pause and resume function.
A healthy alternative to deep-frying, the Dual Cook Pro requires little to no oil, keeping the same great taste for all the family.
A cooking chart and selection of recipes is included to cook a variety of meats, fish, vegetables, desserts and even dehydrate fruit.
